item.title: My Brother’s Keeper
item.description: A young mother, having had the trying experience of losing a little child in an accident, came to a church leader for a blessing to comfort her in her grief. As she left, she asked through her tears, “Must there always be pain in this life?”

item.title: “What Is Truth?”
